name: Lucid Focus
description: Channel your awareness to sharpen the dream's details, though it slightly numbs emotions.

name: Emotive Surge
description: Let emotions run wild, amplifying passion within the dream but blurring its form.

name: Balanced Meditation
description: Center your mind within the dream, gently enhancing both focus and feeling.

name: Chaotic Inspiration
description: Open the floodgates of creativity - emotion thrives, but stability pays the price.

name: Grounded Realism
description: Anchor the dream in logic and form, stabilizing its structure at the cost of emotional depth.
